subSubSection.paragraph: Type locality: [ Mongolia , Zavkhan Aimag , Otgon District, Buinty-Gol River (ca. N47°14' , E97°38' ), Khudzhirta place] “Changai, Ort Chudschirt südlich von der Stadt Uljassutai; ... Fluss Buintu-gol” ( Sseliwanoff 1881a ) and “Urochische Hudzhirta, k yugu ot g. Ulyasutaya, reka Buynty-Gol” ( Sseliwanoff 1881b ).

subSubSection.paragraph:
Habitat records . Woodlands:
Juglans regia
and
Crataegus
on 1200–1550 m ,
Juglans regia
on 1400 m ,
Betula
on 1850 m ,
Salix
on 2300 m ;
Betula
plantation on 2400 m ; meadows and
Juniperus
wood on 2400–3000 m ;
Juniperus
stand on 2400–2850 m ; scrub on 1800–1900 m ; under stones by river bank on 2400 m ; in snow melt on 3000 m ; unknown habitats on 1250–1550 and 2900 m ( Eason 1997 ); from above than 3000 m ( Zalesskaja 1978 ), unknown habitat on ca. 3330 m ( Trotzina 1894 ).
